item.title: Writing Predictable Elixir Code with Reducers - Part 1
item.description: How to use Elixir built-in feature to create beautiful code. Published on AppSignal Blog.
item.content:encoded:
This is the first part of a series about code predictability on Elixir. It’s a gentle introduction on how anyone can use existing Elixir features to write beautiful code and and gives the reader a gentle introduction into the realm of reducers.

Link: Writing Predictable Elixir Code with Reducers

Published on AppSignal Blog.
